description: Detects usage of "appcmd" to create new global URL rewrite rules. This behaviour has been observed being used by threat actors to add new rules so they can access their webshells.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
false_positives: Legitimate usage of appcmd to add new URL rewrite rules
name: Suspicious IIS URL GlobalRules Rewrite Via AppCmd
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\appcmd.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"appcmd.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:*set* AND process.command_line.text:*config* AND process.command_line.text:*section\:system.webServer\/rewrite\/globalRules* AND process.command_line.text:*commit\:*))
